definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical efficacy of herbal cupping therapy for lumbago due to intervertebral disc diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察特色水藥罐治療椎間盤源性腰痛的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Then the witch placed her cauldron on the fire, to prepare the magic draught.
sentences.chinese: 巫婆於是就把藥罐準備好，來煎這服富有魔力的藥了。

sentences.english: Gradually, I was taken off the medicine and my doctors' visits grew further apart.
sentences.chinese: 漸漸地，我丟開了藥罐子，看醫生的次數也少了。

sentences.english: Using a spacer will also help reduce the possibility of thrush.
sentences.chinese: 利用儲藥罐也會減少發生鵝口瘡的可能。

sentences.english: After last May's Sichuan earthquake, she even flew to affected areas with the cooking pot that she needed to make her herbal medicine.
sentences.chinese: 去年五月四川大地震之後，她甚至抱著藥罐到災區。

sentences.english: It's difficult to turn on local radio or TV without hearing about pot.
sentences.chinese: 要讓當地的廣播電視節目閉口不談藥罐也絕非易事。
